title: Fly TCOMA Scraper Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for flight rewards scraper. Validates config.json structure.

default_programs.description: Default loyalty programs used if route doesn't specify

scraping_settings.description: Configuration for scraper behavior and performance

headless.description: Run browser in headless mode (default: true)

retries.description: Number of retry attempts for failed API calls (default: 3)

search_window_days.description: Number of days ahead/behind to search (default: 60)

departure_date.description: Override departure date (YYYY-MM-DD format). If empty, defaults to 7 days from now

max_offers_per_route.description: Maximum offers per route. 0 = no cap. Default 20 to avoid rate limits.

routes.description: List of flight routes to search

origin.description: Departure airport IATA code (3 letters uppercase)

destination.description: Arrival airport IATA code (3 letters uppercase)

programs.description: Loyalty programs for this route. If empty, uses default_programs.

active.description: Whether to scrape this route (default: true)
